name: Kaboom! (itch)
description:
Bounce on enemies until they explode! Execute special abilities to get as high a score as possible! 

Controls: 
A = move left
D = move right
S = bounce down
Can also use Left, Down, Right keys as alternative.

Special Abilities: For medium skill players. 
Dash Left =  A, A  
Dash Right =  D, D 
Charge Power = Hold down S, then release above an enemy to instantly defeat them. Also allows player to bounce higher off the ground.

Super Abilities: For high skill players.
Fireball = Dash left while charging power. Release charge before animation ends for even more fireballs. Requires good timing.
Fire Dash = Dash right while charging power.
